alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 11 at 12:14PM CDT until April 11 at 12:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM CDT FOR EASTERN OTTAWA COUNTY... At 1213 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wyandotte, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Wyandotte... Peoria... Twin Bridges State Park... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 318 and 324. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
